articles.author: Chris Willman
articles.title: Brandi Carlile on What It Means to Sing ‘America the Beautiful’ at the Super Bowl in a Time of Turmoil: It’s a Song of ‘Fragile Hope, for Where America Could Be’ - Variety
articles.description: Brandi Carlile talks about what it means to sing 'America the Beautiful' at the Super Bowl in a time of national turmoil, as a song of 'fragile hope.'
articles.content: No “Joke”: Brandi Carlile is one of the few vocalists out there with so powerhouse of a voice, she could almost be considered overqualified to sing “America the Beautiful.” That’s what she’ll be doin… [+11210 chars]

articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: Pressure mounts on American Airlines CEO as carrier lags rivals - CNBC
articles.description: American Airlines made $111 million last year, while rivals Delta Air Lines and United Airlines, brought in $5 billion and $3.3 billion, respectively.
